means.word_mean: 1. a city in northwestern Turkey; a Thracian town that was rebuilt and renamed by the Roman emperor Hadrian

auth_sentence.content: In Edirne, on our way to the Selimiye Mosque, we stopped at a small house in a poor neighborhood largely inhabited by Gypsies.
auth_sentence.res_content: In Edirne, on our way to the Selimiye Mosque, we stopped at a small house in a poor neighborhood largely inhabited by Gypsies.
